body: If you want to beat the very best, if you want to make lots of money, if you want to be famous, and succeed and anything you do: Cheat. At everything. All the time. And bribe your superiors whenever possible . Thats it. Thats the trick. Welcome to life :)

title: What the world cup has taught me.
